com.sun.svg.util
Class ProgressiveInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      com.sun.svg.util.ProgressiveInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
public class ProgressiveInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream

The ProgressInputStream class provides a way to notify the application of progress when loading a resource, given an expected resource size.

Constructor Detail

ProgressiveInputStream

public ProgressiveInputStream(java.io.InputStream pis,
                              int lengthEstimate,
                              ProgressiveInputStream.Listener listener)
Creates a new instance of ProgressiveInputStream

Parameters:
pis - the proxied InputStream instance. Should not be null
lengthEstimate - the anticipated input stream length. Should be strictly positive.
listener - the ProgressiveInputStream.Listener instance to notify when the input stream has been fully loaded.
